alert.note: Alert for Santa Monica Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 24 at 5:17AM PST until November 25 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, areas of north to northeast winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, areas of north to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Monica Mountains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 3 PM PST this afternoon. For the Wind Advisory, from 3 PM this afternoon to 11 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
